abstract: Google News offers a new feature that allows people quoted in news articles to post a comment that will be paired with that article online.
snippet: Google News offers a new feature that allows people quoted in news articles to post a comment that will be paired with that article online.
lead_paragraph: THE days when the journalist had the last say about a subject are long gone. This thought is usually expressed by repeating  and then dismissing as outdated  the words of A. J. Liebling: “Freedom of the press is guaranteed only to those who own one.”

headline.main: Quoted in the News? Post a Comment, Please
headline.print_headline: Quoted in the News? Post a Comment, Please

abstract: Are we living in a Google World, where everything is free thanks to the advertising that can be generated by people using the Google tools?
lead_paragraph: Are we living in a Google World, where everything is free thanks to the advertising that can be generated by people using the Google tools?

headline.main: More Questions We Thought, But Didn’t Ask, in 2007
